messages.title: A Brighter Future for Our Country with the Liberal Democrats
messages.content: Lib Dems promise 35 hours of free childcare from nine months old. Liberal Democrats pledge to plough billions into mental health by putting a penny on income tax.

messages.title: More Cuts to our NHS, Schools, and Police with the Conservatives
messages.content: 83% of schools will be worse off next year than they were in 2015. Majority believe lying Boris Johnson will sell off NHS services to US.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems promise 35 hours of free childcare from nine months old.
Liberal Democrats pledge to plough billions into mental health by putting a penny on income tax.
83% of schools will be worse off next year than they were in 2015.
Majority believe lying Boris Johnson will sell off NHS services to US.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Bath is 1 of 50 seats across the country that can stop the Conservatives. Labour can't win in seats like yours.
